roleset.name: cease
roleset.note: LAPSE-V NOTES: Watch out for adjectival usages. (from lapse.01-v)

example.name: and that's the end of that
example.text: The limit lapses under current exchange rules if contracts trade above the limit price during the opening 10 minutes of trading.
example.arg: if contracts trade above the limit price during the opening 10 minutes of trading
